data.text: Terrible things will happen to you people of Ethiopia!
Your rulers send ambassadors that sail quickly down the river in papyrus boats.
You messengers must tell people everywhere,
Listen because Yahweh has told me this:
But even before the army of Ethiopia starts to attack,
All the soldiers in the army of Ethiopia will be killed,
At that time, the people of that land that is divided by the branches of that one big river will take gifts to Yahweh in Jerusalem.
